entry.title: Forza Motorsport 7 is being removed from storefronts in September
entry.summary: Microsoft's Turn 10 Studios has announced that Forza Motorsport 7 is being delisted from the Microsoft Store and Xbox Game Pass, just four years after launch due to expiration of licenses. Read More.

entry.title: Siri accused of anti-China bias after inaccurate Olympic medal tally
